item.title: Hello Git
item.description: Hello git 所以，把页面的http链接都换成https也是不对的。要想让https小灰锁变成安全的小绿锁其实非常简单，只需要在页面head里加入以下

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: Hugo themes https://www.xianmin.org/ https://github.com/xianmin/hugo-theme-jane https://github.com/servicemesher/website Hugo输出API 主要参考以下两篇文章 使用 Hugo 生成 API 接口 hugoGetApi

item.title: GitHub Hexo Next搭建博客
item.description: GitHub账号注册 GitHub上新建一个仓库，命名为user.github.io Git安装使用 git --version 配置个人信息 git config --global user.name "yourname" git config --global user.email "youremail@example.com" 生成SS

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post $ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server $ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files $ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to
